plot: A weekly programme for topics within the music of the rock era, usually featuring studio guests from Danish music and often consisting in part of home made documentaries.

plot_es: A weekly programme for topics within the music of the rock era, usually featuring studio guests from Danish music and often consisting in part of home made documentaries.
title: Musikprogrammet - programmet om musik
